data.oai_dc:dc: Bayesian inference majority rule consensus tree of the nrDNA cistron of 25 southern African Oxalis accessions and Oxalis corniculata. The nrDNA alignment was partitioned into 18S, ITS1, 5.8S, ITS2 and 26S.
cytonuclear discordance|genome skimming|low-copy nuclear genes|species tree|target enrichment
